scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:database
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules dist uploads
